archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Unified communications
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: <languages xml:space="preserve"><nl-NL>Functionaliteit voor de (geïntegreerde) communicatie tussen mensen via verschillende kanalen (spraak, instant messaging, video, e.d.)</nl-NL><en-US>Functionality for (integrated) communication between people via different channels (speech, instant messaging, video, etc.)</en-US></languages>

properties.value: Functionaliteit voor de (geïntegreerde) communicatie tussen mensen via verschillende kanalen (spraak, instant messaging, video, e.d.)
Functionality for (integrated) communication between people via different channels (speech, instant messaging, video, etc.)
